node.pre-test:
set -e if [ -z $RECIPE_MYSQL_DIR ]; then MYSQL_HOST="cnt-dbm-test.passport.yandex.net"; else MYSQL_HOST="127.0.0.1"; fi MYSQL_CREDS="-h $MYSQL_HOST -P ${RECIPE_MYSQL_PORT:-3306} --protocol tcp -u $BB_PASSPORTDB_USER_RW ${BB_PASSPORTDB_PASSWD_RW:+-p$BB_PASSPORTDB_PASSWD_RW}"
${RECIPE_MYSQL_DIR}mysql $MYSQL_CREDS -Dpassportdbshard1 -e "INSERT IGNORE INTO account_deletion_operations (uid,started_at) VALUES (425,from_unixtime(1000)), (426,from_unixtime(2000)), (427,from_unixtime(3000)), (428,from_unixtime(3000)), (429,from_unixtime(5000));" ${RECIPE_MYSQL_DIR}mysql $MYSQL_CREDS -Dpassportdbshard2 -e "INSERT IGNORE INTO account_deletion_operations (uid,started_at) VALUES (1130000000000005,from_unixtime(4000)), (1130000000000006,from_unixtime(5000));"
node.case:
Testing pwdhistory method behavior blackbox pwdhistory junit-test; dot.user; two_pwd_user; pwd_changer; invalid * * * *
missing_uid
invalid invalid_uid
empty missing_depth
invalid invalid_depth
missing_password
invalid1; invalid2 invalid_reason
junit-test; dot.user passwd_not_found
two_pwd_user two; three; four qweqwe one passwd_found_reason_1
two_pwd_user two; three; four qweqwe
empty; combined; combined_reversed passwd_found_reason_1
mysql> select * from password_history where uid=4001597947 order by ts desc; +--------+------------+---------------------+--------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+ | id | uid | ts | reason | encrypted_password | +--------+------------+---------------------+--------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+ | 140601 | 4001597947 | 2015-10-02 18:45:47 | 2 | 7:2:1:2048:nFqDbQapnnG4yWSAbyWDKg:u8mXGJ6f/OaNuKCHKHztkEHNmAmZe+lpHWFB57nENJY | qwerty, another uid | 48363 | 4001597947 | 2015-10-02 15:01:34 | 3 | 6:unacceptable_hash | | 48361 | 4001597947 | 2015-10-02 14:45:50 | 3 | 6:1:1:2048:2IgO/ghw:orMCPLuH57ceodjlQWqd5g:Im7gk+9fs970ZNxrdOjafceIDWkyZdjgA8Ipsilcwts | qwerty | 48359 | 4001597947 | 2015-10-02 14:45:43 | 2 | 7:2:1:2048:61WZrdI81V1j4l1Z9Ls9Nw:1L0Oa62ijPug8s0C8zhz7pYyU23coFyxXvObCiv1AcY | qwerty | 48303 | 4001597947 | 2015-10-02 11:56:21 | 1 | 6:1:1:2048:2IgO/ghw:orMCPLuH57ceodjlQWqd5g:Im7gk+9fs970ZNxrdOjafceIDWkyZdjgA8Ipsilcwts | qwerty | 48301 | 4001597947 | 2015-10-02 11:52:10 | 1 | 6:1:1:2048:OiRjQtok:RdXYO1lgs4AFrVhS3revrQ:M+8n6G9ftpY5nFE4G69TZyLYy3sOcT7aqwgOUxu3M2o | qweqwe +--------+------------+---------------------+--------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+ 6 rows in set (0.01 sec)
pwd_changer two; three; four qwerty three passwd_found_reason_3
pwd_changer three; four qwerty
empty; combined; combined_reversed passwd_found_reason_3
pwd_changer two; three; four qwerty two passwd_found_reason_2
